title: QUCT: Criticality Parameter gamma-star for Riemann Zeros
description: Open-source reference implementation of QUCT (Qadmon Universal Criticality Theory) for extracting and validating the dimensionless criticality parameter gamma* from a variational stability functional F(γ). The package contains high-precision Python code for solving F'''(γ) = 0, obtaining gamma*_QUCT ≈ 0.3958242245, and a minimal LaTeX manuscript (docs/quct_gamma_star.tex) describing the mathematical framework and numerical protocol.
